Package PloyGame

package PloyGame
  • Class
    Description
    Commander
    Class that represents a Commander piece.
    Lance1
    Class that represents a Lance1 piece.
    Lance2
    Class that represents a Lance2 piece.
    Lance3
    Class that represents a Lance3 piece.
    main
     
    PieceFactory
    Class that creates the requested type of piece.
    PieceInterface
    Interface to be used along the piece factory
    PloyBoard
    Concrete class representing the logic aspects of the game board
    PloyBoardSquare
    Concrete class for representing a board square, contains all the information about the piece placed on it.
    PloyController
    Concrete controller class for Ploy
    PloyFileManager
    Concrete class of a file manager for Ploy
    PloyGUI
    Concrete class representing a GUI for Ploy
    PloyModerator
    Concrete class for a moderator for Ploy in charge of reviewing the game's state to determine if a player is out, legal moves and game over conditions.
    PloyPiece
    Concrete class representing a piece of Ploy.
    PloyPlayer
    Concrete class representing a player for Ploy.
    PloyRotateIcon
    The PloyRotateIcon allows you to change the orientation of an Icon by rotating the Icon before it is painted.
    PloyRotateIcon.Rotate

    Class that represents a Probe1 piece.
